data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: If you want to overcome inertia, you have to apply a force. A ____ will ____ something ____ is ____ start ____ move, like ____ a ____ of ____ with a pencil ____ make ____ move. Also ____, ____ to ____, ____ slow ____ stop ____ that ____ already ____. The wad of paper will be slowed by resistance made by rubbing up against the air it is passing through.
data.partBlankContent: If you want to overcome inertia, you have to apply a force. A fo___ will ma__ something th__ is st___ start t_ move, like flic____ a w__ of pa___ with a pencil wi__ make i_ move. Also fo___, d__ to resis_____, wi__ slow o_ stop some_____ that i_ already mov___. The wad of paper will be slowed by resistance made by rubbing up against the air it is passing through.
data.fullContent: If you want to overcome inertia, you have to apply a force. A force will make something that is still start to move, like flicking a wad of paper with a pencil will make it move. Also force, due to resistance, will slow or stop something that is already moving. The wad of paper will be slowed by resistance made by rubbing up against the air it is passing through.
data.answer: 如果你想克服惯性，你必须施加一个力。一个力会使物体开始移动，就像用铅笔轻敲一团纸会使它移动一样。同样，由于阻力，力会使已经在运动的物体减速或停止运动。纸团的速度会因为与空气摩擦产生的阻力而减慢。
